title: Stuck in lobby RIOT EMERGENCY PLEASE HELP ASAP
body:
We are stuck in lobby at 0 seconds for someone who has failed to pick a champion. Have been for over a minute now here is a screen shot for proof. All of us are in promos so none of us can dodge
https://snag.gy/AfpUy2.jpg
update: 3 people have left from my team and we are still stuck on this screen I do not want to leave cause itll lose me my promos.

replies.body:
Here you go. I'm still stuck in lobby though :/ the log reader is from my previous game which ended 2 minutes before I started this one up
https://snag.gy/fVDa5A.jpg

Yoooooooo sorry about such a long delay in my response! If you just comment, it doesn't notify us. To get our attention again make sure to actually click reply on our comments!

That's heckin' weird.....tbh I'm really not sure what's keeping you in that game. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you haven't already and they should be able to help!

gda  ttahfa ytuyaz ,trafga trafa fgahgahjgh fg fg gf  g jrt    a aa  a a a a a  a a a a a a  a a a  Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q QQQ Q QQ Q Q Q    Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q QQ Q Q Q  Q QQ Q Q Q  Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q Q
Exact same thing has happened to me
45 minutes stuck in lobby. @Broporo I did as you asked anything you can tell me?
Still stuck in the lobby been 32 minutes now.

I'm noticing a decent number of reports about players getting stuck at 0 in champ select. We're working on figuring out exactly what's going on, but in the meantime try adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and go ahead and run the [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) if you can. Grab a screenshot of what it says and post it here for me to see.
